group_1.narration: I was happy that Iroha helped bring@Yachiyo and me back together!
It's true that I'm the mightiest Magical Girl and can fight@on my own, and though I'm a novice when it comes to [textBlue:Rumors]...
I wanted to help Iroha, so I followed her, making up@excuses to myself that it was okay to stay with her.
On the day Iroha's Doppel emerged,
a Magical Girl from Mitakihara City fought beside me and@gave me a warning, saying that "Yachiyo is lying."
What this girl was saying might be true,
but I remained by Yachiyo's side,@continuing to believe in her.
When I told her it felt just like the old days...@she didn't say anything.
But she didn't push me away, either, so Yachiyo and I@ended up fighting together more and more often anyway.
Of course, I knew it was because Iroha@was at the center of it all.
Still, when I met Felicia and Sana, Mikazuki Villa became@lively again. The number of people hanging around grew,@and we soon bought new mugs for everyone.
I was so happy because it felt like@I was back in those days.
Since I'm the second oldest,@I need to become even stronger!
I was determined to protect everyone.
No, maybe that's not it...@When I look back at my reunion with Mifuyu,
my heart still felt hollow, then.
I was sad, but...@Even more than that, I was impressed by@just how reliable Mifuyu was.
Mifuyu was so devoted to the Wings of the Magius that I became@interested in just what kind of organization they were.
The person who showed up for us was Touka Satomi,@a central figure of the Wings of the Magius.
If it's a dangerous organization,@then we must defeat it to protect everyone.
...But it seemed like she was saying@that it was for "saving" Magical Girls.
Just what does this girl know...?
And what will happen to me if I hear...?
Carrying that anxiety in my chest,@I faced the truth about Magical Girls.
